capability.name: Corporate Trust Services
capability.definition: This Service Domain provides corporate trust services centered on the handling of debt instruments and escrow account support
capability.role: Provide corporate trust services focused on the independent/fiduciary handling of a broad range of possible corporate debt instruments with investors and supporting escrow account arrangements as necessary
capability.example: A corporate uses the corporate trust services of the bank to manage its investor relations for a major debt issue

key_features.name: Administer financial reporting with bond investors
key_features.description: Enables administer financial reporting with bond investors to support this service domain provides corporate trust services centered on the handling of debt instruments and escrow account support

key_features.name: Resolve investor issues as an objective/independent party
key_features.description: Enables resolve investor issues as an objective/independent party to support this service domain provides corporate trust services centered on the handling of debt instruments and escrow account support

key_features.name: Establish and maintain supporting escrow accounts
key_features.description: Enables establish and maintain supporting escrow accounts to support this service domain provides corporate trust services centered on the handling of debt instruments and escrow account support
